candidates.why: Exact command (oracle). Same group, same artifacts (CLAUDE.md), same batching + tool fallback.
Same CLAUDE.md update family; shares y/n plan gate, batching (4/module), and gemini->qwen->codex fallback.
Same changed-module detection + depth batching behavior; nearly identical coordinator/worker split and thresholds (<15 / >=15).
Similar plan gate + multi-depth/layer execution model; useful for verification/safety patterns and reporting style.
Same group and user workflow surface; useful for consistent memory command doc structure and examples style.

selected.reason: Use the command's own doc as the oracle reference to avoid drift; use sibling memory commands as secondary pattern references.
